name: Monster Breeder
description:
*Still BETA - may receive updates.

Breed custom monsters for your customers!

Use punnett squares to predict the offspring of each monster and match the customer's order, useing the fewest amount of breeds.

The closer you match your customer's order, the higher you will be paid.

Buy eggs to unlock new traits from the shopkeeper.

Each trait represents a different type of dominance (complete, incomplete, and co-dominance).

Art, animation, and programming: Peas_N_Carrots

Music and sound effects: zapsplat.com
